amendatorysection.catchline: Physician or physician assistant; telehealth; prescribe drug.
amendatorysection.para: (1) A physician or physician assistant may establish a provider-patient relationship through telehealth.

(2) A licensed physician or licensed physician assistant who is providing a telehealth service to a patient may prescribe the patient a drug if the licensed physician or licensed physician assistant is authorized to prescribe.
(3) The department may adopt and promulgate rules and regulations pursuant to section 38-126 that are consistent with this section.
